info.title: LMS API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for LMS Smart Notebook project

post.summary: Generate JWT token for LMS iframe
post.description: Generate a JWT access token for a student to use in LMS iframe. Returns the token, expiration time (seconds), and issued timestamp.

post.summary: Generate flashcards for a note using AI
post.description: Generates up to 5 educational flashcards for the specified note using OpenAI. Requires authentication.

note_id.description: The ID of the note to generate flashcards for

answer.example: It is the process by which plants make food using sunlight.

422.description: Validation error or AI response error

post.summary: Get all flashcards for a note
post.description: Fetches all flashcards related to a specific note. Requires authentication.

note_id.description: ID of the note to fetch flashcards for

answer.example: It is the process by which plants make food using sunlight.

get.summary: Get folders for a student and course
get.description: Returns a list of folders (with their notes) for a specific student and course.

400.description: Folder is not empty and cannot be deleted

message.example: Folder is not empty and cannot be deleted

post.summary: Move a note to a folder
Upload an image for a note
post.description: Uploads an image (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg, max 2MB) for a specific note and student. Returns the image URL on success.

image.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg, max 2MB)

post.summary: Convert a Word file to HTML (with images) and store assets by note/student
post.description: Uploads a .doc/.docx file and note_id, converts it to HTML using LibreOffice, saves all images and HTML under structured folders, and returns the HTML.

html.description: HTML content of the converted Word file

get.summary: Get list of notes filtered by student, course, unit, and lesson
Get a note by its ID

put.summary: Update a note by its ID

delete.summary: Delete a note by its ID

post.summary: Get or create a note based on student, course, unit, and lesson

200.description: Reused empty note and updated timestamp & title.

message.example: Reused empty note and updated timestamp & title.
Previous note had content. Created new note.

post.summary: Get notes by student and course

get.description: Exports the specified note as a PDF file and returns the PDF file for download.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: ID of the note to export

get.description: Exports the specified note as a Word (.doc) file and returns the file for download.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: ID of the note to export

post.summary: Generate multiple choice questions using AI
post.description: Generates up to 4 multiple choice questions (MCQs) for the specified note using AI (OpenAI GPT). Requires authentication.

note_id.description: The ID of the note to generate quiz questions for

question.example: What is the capital of France?

422.description: Validation error or AI response error

post.description: Fetches all quiz questions related to a specific note. Requires authentication.

note_id.description: ID of the note to fetch quizzes for

put.summary: Submit or update a quiz result
put.description: Submits or updates the quiz result (score) for a given note. Returns previous and current score.
